captions.text: I Play WOW, can't nobody mess with me now.
I'm on a quest with my guild getting wild.
Its my crowd, and I'm proud, screw you, I'm down, shut your mouth.
Schools out works over take your face to Coffee Bean.
I gotta get to Azeroth, you Luddites ain't stopping me.
My equips legit, look me up in the armory.
Were at war stupid buster, theres no peace or harmony.
No one seems to get it, but thats alright.
My girl keeps whining, complaining and starting fights.
She wants to cuddle and watch movies in the candlelight.
But wednesdays thru fridays are strictly raid nights.
When I'm down or depressed, I go connect.
My real friends are online fighting to the death.
Moms banging on my door come eat your eggs and bacon.
MOM YOU'RE MESSING ME UP! YOU'RE LIKE LEROY JENKINS.
I call it straight dedication, you can call it crazy.
You talking stuff man, why don't you come and play me?
I'm going 22 hours, who you calling lazy?
I'M PWNIN NOOBS AT PVP AND MY LEVELS PAST 80!!!
I Play WOW, can't nobody mess with me now.
I'm on a quest with my guild getting wild.
Its my crowd, and I'm proud, screw you, I'm down, shut your mouth.
I play WOW, I play WOW, I play WOW, turn it up say it loud.
I play WOW, I play WOW, I play WOW, turn it up say it loud.
You can say I'm a fanatic or even addicted.
Say my habits are bad, my silly life is conflicted.
But if it makes me happy, why should I quit this?
The world brings me down WOW makes me uplifted.
Every moment with my guild is a moment I cherish.
Call me a nerd, call me a geek, but Im no longer embarrassed.
Say I'm socially screwed, never have kids or a marriage.
I don't live my life for money, fame or chasing your carrots.
An while people like to hate discriminate and be mean.
In my world we work together to defeat the Lich King.
Doesn't matter if your Black, white, ugly or fat.
EVERYONE BE KICKING BOODIE IN THE WORLD OF WARCRAFT!!!
Real life can be harsh and put me down.
Telling me I ain't nothing and I'm on shaky ground.
But I don't hear that anymore, my headphones up too loud.
I'm on top of the world cause, I... PLAY WOW!!!
I Play WOW, can't nobody mess with me now.
I'm on a quest with my guild getting wild.
Its my crowd, and I'm proud, screw you, I'm down, shut your mouth.
I play WOW, I play WOW, I play WOW, turn it up say it loud.
I play WOW, I play WOW, I play WOW, turn it up say it loud.
I'm down with the horde, I'm a blood elf paladin.
Alliance messing with me, the humans are challenging.
When you can't understand me this is what I do.
Tell you GET OFF OF MY CHANNEL! GO LEARN YOUR CLASS NOOB!
Or better yet go play ROCK BAND with that sad guitar.
And no, I don't want to date your stupid AVATAR.
I'm getting busy clocking kills in every single way.
My guild legit, come on man this ain't FELICIA DAY.
And who thought there come a time where the world would see.
Millions of critics and cynics who feel just like me.
Were all living in a better alternate reality
SPENDING ALL DAY DREAMING PVP STRATEGIES!!!
I Play WOW, can't nobody mess with me now.
I'm on a quest with my guild getting wild.
Its my crowd, and I'm proud, screw you, I'm down, shut your mouth.

comments.author: Michael Damman

comments.text:
8 years since i started wow, returning and coming back so many times, 
playing through vanilla as a 9 y/o (Turning 19 this year) and only ever 
hitting level 45 through vanilla and bc to finally get to max level in 
WOTLK and too young to know how to raid or actually think about enchants, 
buffs and rotations.

Dancing on top of the SW bank boxes and actually meeting people in 
Darnassus as a lone night elf at level 4 after getting lost. 
Or in Fargodeep mines, getting told i will be reported for stealing 
someones kills and crying because i didn't want to leave so early.

I will never regret playing at my friends house on his brothers shitty 
computer and enjoying the feeling of exploring the barrens and getting 
those bloody zevbra hoofs (spelt differenty to real life zebras i am pretty 
sure) 
Or sitting outside deadmines and meeting level 19 twinks going in to farm 
and taking the cool swords but giving you everything else.

Or being rezzed in Wetlands on the road to Arathi highlands because i had 
no mount (couldn't afford it) and saving me the walk back. 

Man this game brings back feels. So much more i could remember about the 
game, one day i just want to start up my old account and see what i had in 
my bags and remember the things i was doing on my twink and 45 night elf 
druid.

This game is literally the best game in my life, i will play it until the 
day it ends and play the next warcraft game to come.﻿

I think that gaming is a good thing that happened to this world. Look at 
how many young people do drugs or alcohol or smoking...even criminal 
activities. So let me ask you this now - would you like your child to sit 
by the computer and play a video game or would you like to get a call from 
local PD at 3am saying that you need to pick up your kid from the station?﻿

comments.text:
Also Im not even mad to be honest with you..Us people who like my little 
pony because of its storyline, Yes it was originally intended for girls in 
the late 90's and 80's but it included girly stereotypes and lacked 
personality and storyline in the characters back then, But now if you look 
at it its less of a "Girly" look to and you think were gay? Well recent 
studies show that 95% of the fandom is heterosexual (All the members this 
is including) But if you look at us and another fandom were just the same! 
If you look at another show fandom and compare it to that you will see 
were, maybe the same with some differences. But you just look at us as 
crazy because of our outer appearance, You know don't judge a book by its 
cover because the book still could be good.

comments.text:
strange, so many ppl failing to realise that "gaming" is a hobby. 
Distracting you from more important things such as work and relationships? 
well, balance! Fun is important too. Jogging, Golfing, watching sports, 
crocheting, watching movies,collecting stamps, making bird houses, and for 
some even picking your nose, are also hobbies. Resist the temptation to 
judge someone else's journey on the bumps in your own road.﻿

comments.text:
+Vera Renner I'm a gamer and I don't feel bad about it. I balance this with 
real life and play during my down time. I've always said wars would end 
everywhere if they played WOW. They wouldn't have time to fight wars they 
would be too busy raiding! Same thing with gangs and addicts. Give them 
something else to do. Gaming can be addictive but it's a hell of a lot 
better than, war, drugs, gangs or booze.
comments.author: M Pine

comments.text:
My opinion is whatever you do in your spare time is your own business. If 
someone wants to sit and do nothing in their spare time they shouldn't be 
judged for that. What bugs me is when people don't have jobs and my taxes

me.

+Thunderblase

comments.author: artur297

comments.text:
+Thunderblase I don't think your comprehension skills are working 
correctly. It seems like Vera was actually saying that people who play a 
game shouldn't be judged since they are just doing what they find fun, like 
everyone does in their own way, such as exercising, sports, movies, etc. 
Most of the comments that are negative about wow mention how it ruined 
their lives, or how people who play lack one. No, if you know what balance 
is and consider a game as a hobby, you won't have a problem with it. I've 
played wow since 2006 and have had no issues with my life due to it.
comments.author: Degrastic

comments.text:
and then here are you, in the comment section complaining about people and
